title: Krepo and Quickshot...
body: No synergy at all... XD Krepo is doing fine as a caster, don't get me wrong though.

replies.body: I don´t think it´s that bad...and keep in mind that they have to cast a lot of games since deficio is currently ruled out, must be pretty exhausting for them.
Yeah I heard about Deficio today. For a second I thought they were testing Krepo by having him cast so many times.
Its just quickshot he is complete garbage both in the job he does, tgat and he is a 40 year old man with a peirced eyebrow.

Ya know, I made a post about Krepo last week and I stand by it.  I think he's a great caster and I hope they keep him around either in the EU or NA after this whole Deficio thing gets sorted out.  Chemistry between casters isn't made in an instant and if I remember right Deficio had a slow start to casting last season as well.  Krepo is incredibly knowledgeable and brings a lot to the table.
Ya, with Deficio out they are doing their best.
